snippet.title: Tales of Monsterland DX – Gameboy/Chromatic Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
TALES OF MONSTERLAND DX is a new Gameboy game and launch title for the ModRetro Chromatic that hearkens back to a golden age of platforming adventures.

Explore an interconnected world, discovering hidden items and areas.
‍
Designed to run on original Gameboy Color hardware, Tales of Monsterland is a love letter to the classic platform games of the 8-bit era.

Pre-orders now live –

https://modretro.com/products/tales-of-monsterland-dx
